actions_taken.details: Analyzed user request to create an ADR for using Poetry as the package manager
Created task 024#docs#poetry_package_manager_adr for documenting the Poetry package manager decision
Added the new task to task_queue.jsonl

result.summary: Successfully created and integrated a new documentation task for creating an ADR about using Poetry as the package manager. The task has been assigned to the docu-crafter mode with appropriate context and acceptance criteria.
